layout.singingstanza: May Je -- ho -- vah who made heav -- en and earth Bless you from Zi -- on, may Je -- ho -- vah bless you! May Je -- ho -- vah who made heav -- en and earth Bless you from Zi -- on, may Je -- ho -- vah bless you! May Je -- ho -- vah bless you; May Je -- ho -- vah bless you! May Je -- ho -- vah bless you; May Je -- ho -- vah bless you!

lyrics.stanza: May Jehovah who made heaven and earth Bless you from Zion, may Jehovah bless you! May Jehovah who made heaven and earth Bless you from Zion, may Jehovah bless you!
Verses 1 and 2 can be sung together.
